articles.title: 6 things that changed for the stock market overnight - Gift Nifty, US jobless claims to drop in Nvidia shares | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Asian markets traded mostly lower and US stocks gained overnight while treasury yields rose on expectations that US inflation will remain high.
articles.content: The Indian stock market indices are expected to open on a tepid note Thursday following mixed cues from global peers. Asian markets traded mostly lower and US stocks gained overnight while treasury y… [+5674 chars]
